meanings.definition: The study of oceans and marine life.
meanings.sent1: Oceanologies help us learn about the sea and its creatures.
meanings.sent2: She is passionate about oceanologies and wants to protect marine life.
meanings.sent3: The oceanologies class had a whale of a time learning about sea creatures.
meanings.sent4: Exploring oceanologies is like diving into a deep, mysterious world.
meanings.sent5: His fascination with oceanologies began when he saw a documentary about marine biology.

meanings.definition: The scientific study of oceans and their ecosystems.
meanings.sent1: Researchers use oceanologies to understand the complex marine environment.
meanings.sent2: Oceanologies play a crucial role in preserving the delicate balance of ocean ecosystems.
meanings.sent3: The oceanologies conference was a wave of new discoveries and insights.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an ocean of knowledge, filled with the depths of oceanologies.
meanings.sent5: Studying oceanologies is like unraveling the secrets of the underwater world.
